CountStatistic.name: CreateCount
CountStatistic.description: The number of application and module class loaders created.

CountStatistic.name: StopCount
CountStatistic.description: The number of class loaders for modules that have been stopped.

CountStatistic.name: DestroyedCount
CountStatistic.description: The number of application and module class loaders that have been destroyed (garbage collected).

CountStatistic.name: LeakedCount
CountStatistic.description: The number of leaked class loaders.
